node.title: Port Beach unpatrolled at time of fatal shark attack, Health Minister reveals
node.alt: A wide shot of two lifesavers walking along a beach.
node.description: WA Health Minister Roger Cook says the location of surf lifesaving patrols will be examinedÂ as beaches in the vicinity of this weekend's fatal shark attack reopen.
node.content:
["The Perth\u00a0beach where a swimmer was fatally attacked by a great white shark was not patrolled at the time of the attack, WA Health Minister Roger Cook says.", "Paul Millachip, 57, was attacked during his regular morning swim at Port Beach on Saturday,\u00a0and beaches in the area were immediately closed for the weekend. They\u00a0reopened to the public today.", "Mr Cook said\u00a0the location of surf lifesaver patrols would be considered in the wake of the incident, with Port Beach unpatrolled on the day of the attack while Leighton, about two kilometres north, had lifesavers rostered on duty.", "\"We'll look at all those elements and make sure that we can understand how we can better respond,\" he said.", "Mr Millachip was swimming about 50 metres off the coast when the shark attacked, near a group of young people on a boat who saw the encounter unfold and reportedly tried to help him.", "They quickly alerted emergency services\u00a0as well as those in the water to what had happened, earning praise from authorities and beachgoers.", "", "
Paul Millachip, pictured with his wife,\u00a0was swimming off the beach on Saturday morning when he was attacked.(Supplied: WA Police)
", "The beaches were\u00a0reopened at about 7:30am today, with a warning from Surf Life Saving WA that \"beach users are advised to remain vigilant\".", "
Shark mitigation strategies defended
", "Speaking this morning, Deputy Premier Roger Cook defended the state government's approach to ocean safety.", "He pointed to the state's shark monitoring system, the SharkSmart app, and incentives for people to purchase shark deterrents.", "\"We've got a range of programs which are rolling out, the most comprehensive in the country, and we'll continue to make sure that we bring all those elements together as part of a coherent and comprehensive strategy,\" he said.", "", "
Beaches along Perth's coast from Port Beach to Cottesloe\u00a0were closed after the shark attack.(ABC News:\u00a0Tabarak Al Jrood)
", "Mr Cook pledged to look into what had happened, and said his \"heart and condolences\" went to Mr Millachip's family.", "\"It's still early days and obviously everyone's shocked and everyone is still trying to comprehend what is obviously a dreadful and terrible tragedy,\" he said.", "\"But we need to continue to learn from these experiences and make sure that we can do everything that is possible and appropriate to keep people safe.\"", "
Regular swimmers cautiously return
", "The Port Beach Polar Bears are a group of swimmers who have been braving the\u00a0surf at Port Beach early each morning for decades.", "Some of the group's members returned this morning, including Gary Worthington.", "\"I think we should be called the meerkats this morning,\" he told ABC Radio Perth.", "", "
Gary Worthington returned for his regular swim at Port beach this morning.(ABC News: Kate Leaver)
", "\"Everybody's looking around, everybody's in shallow water.", "\"And probably only half the people, if that, this morning [are] having a swim.\"", "Mr Worthington has been swimming at Port for about 15 years and said most people who took to the ocean understood the risks.", "\"We think about it all the time,\" he said.", "\"All my friends, they always have a go at me and there's a few that have sent emails to me, telling me not to swim.", "\"But it's in your blood and we love it, all for different reasons.\"", "", "
Paul Millachip\u2019s wife thanked teens who alerted beachgoers of the danger.
", "Jo was another swimmer taking to the water today.", "\"It's taken the wind out of the sail of quite a few of the ones that come every morning, and it will take some time for them to get their nerve back,\" she said.", "\"It's our life and it's our home down here.", "\"We do this all year round. It's a beautiful beach and it's not going to stop us.\""]
